head.citation-title: Application of indoline dyes having a carboxylated 1,3-indandione ring linked with thienyl or hexylthienyl ring to dye-sensitized solar cells
head.abstracts: © 2017 Elsevier LtdThe performance of a new indoline dye having a carboxylated 1,3-idandione unit linked with a hexythienyl ring showed higher conversion efficiency than the analogous dye without the hexyl group.

organization.$: Department of Chemistry and Biomolecular Science

coredata.dc:description: The performance of a new indoline dye having a carboxylated 1,3-idandione unit linked with a hexythienyl ring showed higher conversion efficiency than the analogous dye without the hexyl group.
coredata.dc:title: Application of indoline dyes having a carboxylated 1,3-indandione ring linked with thienyl or hexylthienyl ring to dye-sensitized solar cells
